Class MouseWheelEvent

      mdes.slick.sui.event.MouseWheelEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MouseWheelEvent
extends EventObject

A mouse wheel event which holds the amount the wheel has changed since the last event.

Since:
b.0.2
